name: Bootstrap Carousel Swipe and Height
description: Makes it so any Bootstrap carousel that has the "slide" AND "swipe" and.or "vert-swipe" classes will move forward / backwards and/or up / down with swiping. It also makes it so any Bootstrap carousel that has the "aheight" class added to it will have its height animated on transition for a smoother look. You can set the animation speed via "data-aspeed" on the carousel.
author: Nick Kalscheur
